Opusmodus                                                               partial-divide   1

partial-divide size partials
[Function]

Arguments and Values:
size                    a number.
partials                a list of partials.


Description:

The PARTIAL function can be used to divide a list of partials into sublists of a given
size. OPUSMODUS can work with two types of spectral data. A two point data:
frequency and amplitude and a three point data: duration, frequency and
amplitude.

Example with two point data:

(setf p65 (library 'tbn-cs3-frames 'partials 'p65))
=> (137.73865 0.020841 181.65201 1.23E-4 222.27771 1.07E-4 275.2546
0.020598 364.78802 8.3E-5 413.08365 0.020918 459.76276 4.12E-4 550.71014
0.043076 586.6822 6.19E-4 648.09753 4.31E-4 688.3416 0.023011 733.08386
4.02E-4 825.97424 0.015466 862.65826 4.85E-4 890.5245 4.85E-4 963.56256
0.021384 1023.5763 3.41E-4 1101.4019 0.005323 1143.6743 2.15E-4
1167.3666 1.43E-4 1238.9679 0.009996 1285.3225 1.55E-4 1328.1975 3.03E-4
1376.2227 0.003012 1427.9795 2.71E-4 1477.2344 1.79E-4 1514.2887
0.002812 1570.4867 1.04E-4 1587.751 8.4E-5 1651.8394 0.001961 1695.0934
1.17E-4 1747.224 8.7E-5 1789.4663 0.001189 1834.9723 1.02E-4 1927.6
0.001138 1971.7552 6.7E-5 2064.9763 4.75E-4 2109.9128 8.1E-5 2203.0845
3.69E-4 2280.8325 4.0E-5 2341.0615 2.07E-4 2419.2444 4.2E-5 2476.9385
1.27E-4 2563.3 7.7E-5 2616.7273 1.62E-4 2753.6155 9.9E-5 3030.2607
2.47E-4 3306.9165 7.0E-5 3444.827 9.5E-5 3721.5513 4.4E-5 6197.9604
3.8E-5 6605.887 4.6E-5)
Opusmodus                                                 partial-divide   2

(setf pdiv65 (partial-divide 6 p65))
=> ((137.73865 0.020841 181.65201 1.23E-4 222.27771 1.07E-4 275.2546
0.020598 364.78802 8.3E-5 413.08365 0.020918) (459.76276 4.12E-4
550.71014 0.043076 586.6822 6.19E-4 648.09753 4.31E-4 688.3416 0.023011
733.08386 4.02E-4) (825.97424 0.015466 862.65826 4.85E-4 890.5245
4.85E-4 963.56256 0.021384 1023.5763 3.41E-4 1101.4019 0.005323)
(1143.6743 2.15E-4 1167.3666 1.43E-4 1238.9679 0.009996 1285.3225
1.55E-4 1328.1975 3.03E-4 1376.2227 0.003012) (1427.9795 2.71E-4
1477.2344 1.79E-4 1514.2887 0.002812 1570.4867 1.04E-4 1587.751 8.4E-5
1651.8394 0.001961) (1695.0934 1.17E-4 1747.224 8.7E-5 1789.4663
0.001189 1834.9723 1.02E-4 1927.6 0.001138 1971.7552 6.7E-5) (2064.9763
4.75E-4 2109.9128 8.1E-5 2203.0845 3.69E-4 2280.8325 4.0E-5 2341.0615
2.07E-4 2419.2444 4.2E-5) (2476.9385 1.27E-4 2563.3 7.7E-5 2616.7273
1.62E-4 2753.6155 9.9E-5 3030.2607 2.47E-4 3306.9165 7.0E-5) (3444.827
